text: For blind and visually impaired New Yorkers, the decrease in traffic noise because of the pandemic has made it more difficult to navigate city streets. Audible crosswalk signals help, but the vast majority of the city’s 13,200 crossings lack one. https://t.co/PtxbyjZv9t

name: nytimes

text: A small but growing body of evidence suggests that some rapid tests for the coronavirus may falter in children, letting low-level infections slip by unnoticed. https://t.co/yTENnNCPyz

text: The U.S. Soccer Federation and its World Cup champion women’s team said Tuesday that they have reached a deal over working conditions, a rare moment of mutual happiness in the sides’ long-running legal fight about equal pay. https://t.co/CeyXe16CRo

name: nytimes
text:

text:

text:
